text.div:
BC FindingSiteIdentifier Logical Model

A human-readable identifier for the condition at the finding site, for example, a wound number or tumor identifier.

name: FindingSiteIdentifierModel
title: BC FindingSiteIdentifier Logical Model
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: A human-readable identifier for the condition at the finding site, for example, a wound number or tumor identifier.

element.definition: A human-readable identifier for the condition at the finding site, for example, a wound number or tumor identifier.

element.short: String representing a human-readable identifier for the condition at the finding site, for example, a wound number or tumor identifier.
